attributes.action: travel with as small an entourage as possible whilst on Government business, especially leaving partners and family at home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should we the money strapped tax payers pay for all the hangers on that travel with the Prime Minister and all other MPs when they visit other countries on official business for the UK? The money saved could be used for our,(the tax payers ), benefit,eg. NHS, higher State Pensions etc. There is no need for Gordon Brown to trot his wife along for a "jolly" whilst on important Middle East negotiations, unless she is acting as his P.A!
The business in hand only needs certain WORKING staff to assist him and the others whilst travelling abroad in particular.
